Class TextAnalyzerTest

java.lang.Object
TextAnalyzerTest
public class TextAnalyzerTest extends Object
This class contains the unit tests for the TextAnalyzer class (client-side).

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      This method is called before the execution of each test case. It sets up the necessary objects, resources, or configurations required for the test execution. For example, it can initialize the TextAnalysisServer instance and configure a test server socket.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown()
      This method is called after the execution of each test case. It is responsible for cleaning up any resources, objects, or configurations used during the test execution. For example, it can close the test server socket and set the TextAnalysisServer instance to null.

    • testAnalyzeText

      @Test public void testAnalyzeText() throws IOException
      Test the analyzeText() method with a normal input value.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while testing

      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while testing

      @Test public void testSmallInput() throws IOException

      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while testing
